entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
